body.p:
Head-Quarters Military District of Kentucky,
Lexington, Oct. 28th 1864.
Gov. Thos. E. Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Gov.

I take pleasure in recommending Lieut. J. w. McReynolds 3d Ky Lt. Arty. for promotion to the captaincy of his Battery Lieut. McReynolds was with me through the late Morgan Raid in command of the Artillery, and behaved himself with gallantry & managed his Guns with skill & ability

I am very respectfully
Your obdt Sevt
S. G. Burbridge
Brvt. Maj Gen U. S. A.

Head Qrs Mil Dist of Ky
Lexington Oct 28" 1864

Burbridge S. G
Brevt Maj. Genl U. S. A.
Recomends Lt J. A. McReynolds 3" Ky Light Artillery, for promotion to captaincy of his Battery --
Write to Genl B -- what the Lt has represented about the Strength of the Bat & ask if a Capt could be mustered
